website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, cute rabbit hutch that works better outdoors, as it is difficult to clean and gets messy and smelly fast.
pros: Sturdy construction and attractive style are big draws for owners
Assembly is fairly easy, with clear instructions
cons: Can get a bit small for full-grown rabbits
Tray is difficult to pull out and clean
Moisture soaks into wood base, creating odor and potentially causing rot
Rabbits tend to push out their bedding through the sides of the cage

customer_reviews.title: Esther's house
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my bunny soon after we brought her home. It was great for a while but my "mini" lop grew too big. I didn't want to get rid of this house because I just love it... so I bought another and with some crafty engineering Esther now has a right sized home.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Best house for GP's all around!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My guinea pigs love it! We added casters to the legs and move it around the house throughout the day. I actually get compliments on it opposed to trying to hide it when guests come over. It's so much easier to clean than their prior cage with the slide out bottom piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bunny house!
customer_reviews.text: We start d out with one rabbit hutch for two miniature bunnies and it worked ok but we decided they needed more space and a bigger run. So we bought a second hutch and modified it to be a mirror of the first one. We then took the screens out of each end and connected them. The result is now both bunnies have plenty of protected and safe space to hop around in. They obviously love it and also really like their tunnels and protective houses at each end. We gave our bunnies cage a couple of coats of outdoor varnish to make it waterproof :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this cage. It's perfect and just what I was looking for. However, it is not ideal. The poop gets kicked out all day since the sides are open and the pee seeps down into the wood and onto the legs of the cage. The wood will eventually end up rotting. The inside of the hutch is awkward and not easy to clean. The tray is hard to slide in and out. Other than the look of it, it just isn't ideal. We will have to replace the cage after a few months. Sad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Classier than a wire cage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 10 pound lion head bunny. I wanted something classier than a wire cage. Arrived very fast and instructions for building were super easy. I put it together in about an hour. I noticed that my bunny has been chewing the wood inside the cage but I put some animal bitter spray on it and he stopped. I would recommend this cage to a potty trained bunny. The litter box fits perfectly in the corner. I would not put any bunny larger than 10 pounds in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Blondepill

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Easy to assemble took me 20 minutes and a screwdriver! Kind of small, but this is just to socialize her with our kitty and get her ready to roam. Update: so we've had this for about 2 weeks, it's cute, but not much though has gone into the practicality of cleaning it. The whole bottom pulls out, instead of a grated bottom. And the bottom is metal. I have cut and placed 2 layers of cardboard, bedding, paper bedding, but there's nothing to keep in the mess. Even after cleaning daily I get urine on the ground under the cage..... not a winner. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kristi B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that the tray is difficult to slide out if there is bedding in it
customer_reviews.author: Tahla

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously thinking about sending this back. Its gorgeous garbage. The wood is splintering, the paint is odd and feels like printer or chalk, it's not sealed wood, the wood ABSORBS urine or water, and the base leaks anything wet all overt my floor. The nuematic lift is so strong we chose not to attach it because we felt it would break the lid. The only reason I hadn't sent it back already is the deal with having to disassemble pack and ship back, not to mention getting something for him to live in in the mean time. If PetsFit wants to contact me, or return the messages I've sent and solve the problems, that would be quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking rabbit hutch BUT don't let the look fool you. Was easy to it together but we noticed when the bunny peed it would leak out of the sides and end up all over our floor. Had to purchase a different one cause I always had to put something under this cage to keep my floor in good condition. Since the urine came out of cage it also sunk into the wood on the sides leaving a nasty odor. I wouldn't purchase this Hutch.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schoolcraft

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, I added wood glue to all the connections its sturdy. I have 2 rabbits in the hutch and its indoors. There is no pan so the urine just runs right off the flat piece of metal thats in the bottom onto the floor. Lucky for me im a Sheet Metal Worker and I fabed up a pan to replace the bottom flat piece of metal. If I wasnt I would be really disappointed and with the spacific dementions I dont see how you can just go out and buy a pan. So its great as long as your rabbits are litter trained or you put something under the hutch to catch/absorb the urine.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Alan Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: this cage is not worth the money. the look is great but it is not suitable for bunnies whatsoever. they eat the wood, the bedding falls right out of the sides, if they pee whatsoever then it leaks down the legs and all over the floor, there are many reasons why i absolutely could not give this more than 1 star. if i could have given it 0 stars then i would have. it did not come with all the pieces so we had to rig the lid to begin with. i am so unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Sucker for a pretty face😡
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this hutch unless your rabbit exclusively uses a litter box. There are no sides on this open area, just cage bars and EVERYTHING falls out of it. I was cleaning the soiled litter and the floor mess EVERYDAY. Not even joking. There is also a skinny trench, where the bars slip into the wooden frame, that cannot be cleaned without powerful hosing and where soiled litter gets trapped. The cage was pretty but zero practicality for an inside hutch. It lasted 2 weeks before I threw it out and bought a much better inside bunny cage from Oxbow.
customer_reviews.author: julesthereader

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this bunny house!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, love this house. Zoe our bunny is so happy. Was very easy to assemble and is made with great quality especially for the price. Would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Pam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So cute! We live this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s not only functional, it’s adorable too! My son and I put it together in less than a half hour. It’s very lightweight which makes moving it a breeze. Our rabbit is medium sized and could use a bit bigger cage, but I’m just going to order another one of these and connect them. Such a cute little bunny condo! I bought a crate liner to put underneath for hay droppings. No leaks or staining. We sprayed the wood with bitter apple spray and she hasn’t chewed. Great set up especially for a rabbit under about 5 lbs. if bigger, I would suggest getting 2 and putting together like some others have.
customer_reviews.author: RealtorD

customer_reviews.title: ... new cage for my hedgehog and the size is perfect. Relatively easy to put together as long as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a new cage for my hedgehog and the size is perfect. Relatively easy to put together as long as you have a buddy. Recommend using a power drill. The only issue we had was installing the arm for the raising lid. The "instructions" that were included made no sense, so that took a while to figure out. Other than that, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it as night enclosure for my bunny which works fine, she has enough room to sprawl out and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a suitable cage for rabbits. Keep in mind, this is not enough space for your pet to be in all the time. I use it as night enclosure for my bunny which works fine, she has enough room to sprawl out and she weighs about 8 pounds. The drawer is easy to pull out but my rabbit is able to kick most of the litter through the cage onto the floor or push it to the other covered end of the cage. This is a bit annoying and messy. Would not recommend if you have carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - Not waterproof.. Didn't keep it.
customer_reviews.text: So this is just ok - I haven't started using it yet because like the reviews say, it's not water sealed or treated in any way. The drawer is also very hard to pull out. I don't know if I plan to use it because the drawer is so shallow, I can't picture an easy way to clean this. I think I will probably end up selling it locally as there really isn's a way to return it once it's been opened and assembled. UPDATE: I ended up selling this for $50 locally - sadly brand new, never used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Love It. A little messy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage for indoors. Outdoors won’t work well without a roof over all of it. I only gave it 4 stars bc I wish it had a keep the mess contained in the open area. If your bunny doesn’t use a litter box, I think this would be a mess. I’ve always had gone w Prevue without the floor grate, but my bunny is pretty tidy now so thought I could go w this prettier one. He needs a smaller litter box. The covered area is very tall and nice. My bunny seems excited for his new home. I put t together myself without any trouble. Electric drill recommended for ease.
customer_reviews.author: playday05

customer_reviews.title: Gets poop and urine EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is adorable. Its big enough for my rabbit and she likes it, but I am constantly cleaning up poop and pee under her cage. The poop flies out and the pee runs down the wall and has ruined my hardwood floor underneath it. SKIP this set. It is horrible. There is nothing to keep your rabbit from sitting in their poop and pee either. The tray quickly became dark and nasty looking and not stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper2001232

customer_reviews.title: The house is beautiful. However the tray does not hold urine and ...
customer_reviews.text: The house is beautiful. However the tray does not hold urine and feces well and it will be all over the floor and walls. It seems that even with bedding the urine just seeps through. If you buy this defiantly put something under the whole assembly to catch the urine and feces from falling on the floor of your home if you use it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great but also some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this hutch! Very sturdy, stylish, and well-made! The only issue I do take with this hutch is that the inside wooden frame is a prime target for bunny chewing! My rabbit has chewed most of the inner wood framing in this cage already :( It’s not a huge deal but if aesthetic is a big deal for you then you should take that into consideration! The other issue is it’s a bit small for an adult rabbit- great for a bunny but not nearly enough room for an adult. However- I only keep my bun in here during night time and while I’m out of the house so it has worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lawson

customer_reviews.title: This item is absolutely adorable. It arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely adorable. It arrived on time. The packaging was slightly damaged but everything inside was fine. Assembly was easy for me as I’ve assembled many items like this. Now for the negatives. It is SMALL — way to small for even a small bunny. After adopting our bunny from a rescue organization, they heavily discouraged any type of house such as this one. Too many unsafe wood options for chewing and just too small for any bunny. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Braunbach

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cage
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cage, wish it offered an extension. If you are using indoors put a moisture barrier between the cage and floor, it can leak if excessive liquids are on the floor of the cage. I was thankful I had a mat that protected my carpet. It seems bigger in pictures, after putting a litter box, food bowl, a few small chew toys, there was little room for my bunnies to hop around.
customer_reviews.author: kgb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bunny, biggest mistake. Had it for about 2/3 months, already in the trash. Bunnies chewed it up, had a bunny in it that isn’t potty trained yet so the bottom is stained no matter how much I clean it & it stunk up the room. Very pretty to look at when you first get it but really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna Paiva-Silva

customer_reviews.title: Needed some work.
customer_reviews.text: Long review short. When I opened the packaging the smell was absolutely horrible. I had to let the hutch pieces air outside for seven hours. Putting it together wasn't so bad, and it looks cute. NOT rabbit proof. My rabbit started chewing at the wood within minutes. Went to Lowe's and purchased clear corner guards. Caulked in-between the cracks so that bunny poop or other items wouldn't be an issue (read about that being an issue in other reviews). My bunny loves the privacy of her litter box inside the enclosed part. After some improvements I'm happy with it, and so is my bunny. Pictures included. Banana for scale.
customer_reviews.author: christy reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hutch. Nice construction
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hutch. Nice construction. Amazon lists this as appropriate housing for guinea pigs. It is NOT appropriate for guinea pigs! The hutch is made of cedar which is toxic to guinea pigs. Our guinea pig died as a result. 😭 Heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stains

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage for our guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage for our guinea pig. The only down fall is the back and side of the open part of he cage ...it sits almost level w the bottom of the cage so his bedding falls out. We put two small pieces of plexiglass there to help this problem! Issue solved! Other than that, LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute and good bang for your buck ! The hydraulic arm is a pain to assemble and it’s made of soft wood so if you aren’t super careful while putting it together the wood can split. However, I’m happy with my purchase and so is mr. Bunn bunns.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleese

customer_reviews.title: I put caulk around the edges to seal it better. I also put chicken wire on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The tray isn't water proof & leaks . I put caulk around the edges to seal it better. I also put chicken wire on the bottom so the bunny can remain in the cage when I clean it out & so she doesn't have to stand in her own urine. It has a cute look and is very user- friendly, but the tray is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a really great size (I'm 5'4" and the highest point comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great size (I'm 5'4" and the highest point comes to about my waist) and looks very nice. The only thing I'm not a fan of is the bottom part of the opened section isn't low enough to out down bedding or hay. I use it indoors, so it gets all over the floor if I do. Other than that, it's a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price & super easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Just enough space for my mini lop (appx 12" laying with feet back) to lie in the enclosed area or the caged part. I assembled the whole thing in less than an hour (and am not a girl who is super good with tools). Looks very elegant for a bunny cage!
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for a rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and assembly was very easy and my wife had it almost done by herself. Otherwise, I can't find much positive in this hutch. - Bottom tray is too shallow for any meaningful bedding - With a full tray of bedding, you can't slide the tray out easy. Makes such a mess, I typically have to carry the cage outside to clean - Bottom tray leaks urine. I'll likely need to use some caulk or something similar to seal it off.
customer_reviews.author: T.Wells

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job
customer_reviews.text: The cage is great! A bit smaller than I prefer but it wasn’t meant as a permanent situation. It’s been a perfect home so far. I did pin fabric to the back and side so the shavings, poo and urine would stay contained inside the cage. It’s not to difficult for those things to get kicked out. I also found our bunny slipping quite often on the metal pan. Luckily she is litter trained so I was able to stabilize her footing using a grassy type mat for reptiles. It’ll serve well for the meantime!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It's not an eyesore like some animal cages
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy looking little rabbit hutch. Suitable for indoor use, which is what I was looking for. It's not an eyesore like some animal cages. The wood is soft, so if your rabbit likes to chew on walls and stuff, it will very easily chew through it. My bun isn't interested in chewing on it so it works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hutch for our rabbit and he absolutely loves it. He has a decent amount of space to hop around and lounge. Assembly was fairly simple, and took less than an hour. There are lots of little doors that open, allowing easy access for cleaning and bunny snuggles. I haven't used the pull out tray to clean yet, but it seemed to slide in and out easily when being assembled. This is an awesome quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Britni Dawson-Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. looks great in the house . Doesn't take up a lot of space. Easy to put together. Like that it has two doors . Perfect for one small to med. Rabbit . Easy to clean. Not a lot room to run around . But, for us it great .we have a running pen.
customer_reviews.author: Tacomycat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. It is pretty small once you add the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. It is pretty small once you add the food dish and litter pan but my bunny loves it anyways she hasn't wanted to hope out of it lol i guess she getting it homie before she starts exploring again lol we are going to get ramp for it too she can hop out just fine but has a garder time jumping back in
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Hutch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Netherland Dwarf Rabbit. He is 1.5#. This hutch is perfect for him! He feels so comfortable in it, and he enjoys the area where he can hideout. It is super easy to put together (I did it alone) amd extremely easy to clean. I like that there are two areas on the roof you can easily open. Plus, it's a real good looking hutch! I definitely would not put more than one rabbit in it, though. Even with my itty bitty bunny. Bunnies need plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Kjirsten Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo adorable!! Had many compliments on this hutch although ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooo adorable!! Had many compliments on this hutch although my bun got to big so I got him something bigger. Recommend for a mini bun it's adorable!!!!! Wish they had something similar just way bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Brittie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My two bunnies love the cage. I installed a ramp and clipped a pen around it so they can run in and out.
customer_reviews.author: happy dog happy human

customer_reviews.title: but as others say the wood does get pretty soaked with urine
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a year ago. My wife wanted it because it was cute. It has served its purpose, but as others say the wood does get pretty soaked with urine. Our rabbit has just about destroyed it from chewing the wood. I did remove the pan and stapled 1/4” hardware cloth to the bottom, and bought a 36”x48” dog crate tray to catch all droppings. Overall I am satisfied with it. I just wish I knew how much the rabbit would chew up the wood.
customer_reviews.author: jason feil

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Tiny and not practical for a rabbit. My husband had to alter the cage to have a wired floor, and we had to make the wastes tray deeper because it’s much too shallow. The wood also absorbs all of the urine, so be sure to seal it with a sealer before use. I would not recommended this product, and after a month of use we are shopping for a larger, more practical cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. You could easily paint this to the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. You could easily paint this to the colors of your liking. I was happy with this. My bunny is house trained, so I'm passing this onto a friend who has a farm and new baby bunnies. :~)
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat complicated to put together, but manageable. Rabbit ...
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat complicated to put together, but manageable. Rabbit likes to pee off the side so you will have to add your own side panel or cover to keep floors clean. Not the easiest for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cage but hard to clean very hard to pull the tray out
customer_reviews.author: George t Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely as described. So easy to assemble and our bunny loves her new home.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the cage for a day so we will see if I still give it 5 stars in a month, but for now we love it. Perfect size for our dwarf bunny. Easy to assemble. It took my husband and I 30 minutes to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Milton

customer_reviews.title: It's like her luxury retirement condo by the sea
customer_reviews.text: The Rabbit loves it. It's like her luxury retirement condo by the sea. Except no sea. But she is a lot happier and gets more exercise and seems just a lot more peaceful. Great quality. Not too hard to build. Smells better too!
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hutch! Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hutch! Easy to clean! I did make one alteration, I added Plexiglas to the bottom 6" of the caged area to keep the bunnies from pushing out the bedding. I would buy this again, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not adequate for bunny
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is entirely too small to be adequate for a bunny. As a first time bunny owner, I didn't realize what to expect until it was put together, which was after the return date. It also wasn't the most simple to assemble. I highly do NOT suggest this for a bunny. The sizing it not appropriate. A complete waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy to put together (less than 1hr)
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side, but it was easy to put together (less than 1hr), and looks nice enough to keep in the corner of the house when its too cold for the bunny outside.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald City Blues

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and my bunny loves popping in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and my bunny loves popping in and out of his little private "room". Super roomy for him, since he's a netherlands dwarf. I can also perfectly fit a puppy pad in the tray to help,make cleanup easier. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kiri Feisst

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, functional and safe
customer_reviews.text: It’s very attractive but need to make some adjustments for the rabbit litter to stay in the cage, like wrapping a small portion on the bottom with whatever.
customer_reviews.author: HAWKDAD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rabbit hutch!!
customer_reviews.text: We were in need of a bigger rabbit hutch and this beauty did the trick. It wasn't to large or to small it was PERFECT! The process of putting it together was super easy. We had it finished in maybe 20 minutes. The Gray and white color is very beautiful too! The price point was also a plus since others were way more expensive. Great buy for our rabbit!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and easy to assemble, but as soon as my two guinea pigs spent a week, the cage started to stink I cleaned the cage several times, not easy task, poop and pee in between the frame was impossible to clean and the wood started to smell. We placed the cage to be recycled and purchased a plastic one. I wasted my money, so not waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: Busiestmom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty junk!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I describe as pretty junk. This is NOT made for outdoors it is for INSIDE use only. The wood is chinky but the guinea pig seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Very cute sturdy little cage
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute little cage (we call it the quail condo)! Our little rescued quail loves her cage too, she likes to hide in the house & sleeps right in the doorway. It's built well easy to put together & is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The tray is useless because it is not tall enough for bedding
customer_reviews.text: Attractive looking cage, however all of the bedding falls out of the side slits & back. The tray is useless because it is not tall enough for bedding, when you open it all of the bedding falls under. If you plan to use fleece, this would be nicer. Major flaws in design.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our little Lionhead
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little Lionhead. Tray was a little sticky so rubbed it with a dry bar of soap and now it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. There is no grate on the bottom, so the bunny has to walk in it’s own poop and urine. I keep my rabbit indoors, so it makes such a mess on the floor. It takes so long to clean and I clean her hutch every week. Its functionally a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Meikle

customer_reviews.title: Easy access from top and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves this! We keep it in my daughter's room. It's cute and the right size for him. Easy access from top and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with the cage. The bottom removalable pan is not sealed all the way around. The pan is just a flat metal sheet with a wood frame laying on top. Letting my rabbits pee leave the pan. Very annoying to have to clean up not only the pan up the area around where the leaks are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: While it is a very nice looking cage, the pan on the bottom that catches the dropping is a HORRIBLE design. I have tried nearly everything and the bunnies still manage to pee onto the WOOD pan sides. Which at that point it seeps into the wood and will forever smell like urine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing excellent. Excellent quality and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing excellent. Excellent quality and very easy to install. My little guinea pig love it. I highly recommend this one to all small animal lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble!! The Spark seems to like it. To early to tell if it will hold up though.
customer_reviews.author: kissu

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find! I love the look of this rabbit hutch and it was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect fit for my lion head bunny. Just wish it had wire bottom on open cage part.
customer_reviews.author: HeyGuy83

customer_reviews.title: Super fast ship, read reviews before buying. Not as great as anticipated for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Could definitely use a grate at the bottom. Do not use bedding in this thing or it will be everywhere! Also, bough this for my daughter with the pull out bottom thinking it would be easier for her to care for her bunnies, BUT pull out the bottom slowly and watch it or whatever is sitting at the bottom if it's a lot, will fall right on the floor. Some parts looked a little rough for being a new, and pricey rabbit hutch, but overall it works. Not too bad of a buy, was anticipating better when I looked at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two guinea pigs but they do chew on ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for two guinea pigs but they do chew on the wood. Easy assemble. Easy for my 5 year old to reach in and feed or get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions. Our rabbit is loving this new cage
customer_reviews.text: Put this together last night. Easy instructions. Our rabbit is loving this new cage.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA REEDY

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice hutch for in door and out door. But honestly it is waaay to small for a rabbit. I have a holland lop eared rabbit and he only weighs 5lbs and its too small for him to hop around. Probably going to end up selling the hutch and getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: There is no wire above the tray so the rabbit ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no wire above the tray so the rabbit does have to stand in its own urine! Not the way to make a rabbit hutch. I want to send it back but my son spent hours putting it together. I am writing the mfg. to see what they will do.
customer_reviews.author: BROKEN SPUR cody runyan

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits pee and the wood doesn't seem to be treated ...
customer_reviews.text: Rabbits pee and the wood doesn't seem to be treated so it is going to absorb the smell of the pee and stink and the wood is going to expand making it warp
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Love the hutch love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hutch. Used for my bunny. One side I put a litter box and the other side is food and water. She isn't in the hutch all the time. It would be too small for 24 hour living.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal good
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t a very nice cage, and fit our house great. Big issue is that it doesn’t seal good on the sides, and urine and poop fall between the cracks and all over the actual floor.
customer_reviews.author: The Rubin's

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend for large animals
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Very practical for small to medium sized rabbits. I would not recommend for large animals. Great quality and very nice color. I love that there is a tray that pulls out so it is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Overall very nice
customer_reviews.text: Takes 30 minutes or less to put together. Instructions are well thought out but each hutch I bought - I bought 2 - they had 2 missing screws in each set. Make sure u have extras lying around. Overall very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to build, super easy for my bunny to hop in and out of. Easy to clean as well, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Boat Bro Luis

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love. My guinea pig is going to love this
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Love. My guinea pig is going to love this!!! The wire part looks really cheap but other than that it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay item
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, extremely hard to assemble. Bigger then expected. Not made for all small sized animals like hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: good choice for small animals
customer_reviews.text: could use another coat of paint, however its easy to clean, easy to put together and my birds(quail) like to be able to sit in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Becky syrek

customer_reviews.title: Very well packed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed and easy to assemble. Personally I made several arrangements to the cage; I installed metal wire on the floor so that my rabbit was not in direct contact with his feces or urine, a light, wheels and a grip on the tray to handle it easily. I do not regret having bought the cage, my rabbit loves it and also it is easy to clean it. I expected better wood quality but I feel satisfied. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool little cage. My 11 year old daughter put it together herself!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Tracy

customer_reviews.title: When the rabbit pees near edges it goes all over ...
customer_reviews.text: When the rabbit pees near edges it goes all over the floor. Also this cage needs a separation between the pull out tray and rabbit. I’m cleaning multiple times a day because he’s in his poop and pee.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Filippone

customer_reviews.title: it does the job of providing a comfortable space for the rabbit
customer_reviews.text: The bedding and poop falls out the side since the sides are not elevated. Also the rabbit will eat the wooden siding as well. Otherise, it does the job of providing a comfortable space for the rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Magin

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits love these cages
customer_reviews.text: Rabbits love these cages. We bought a second one we liked it so much. Easy to put together and easy for changing bedding or feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very cute, my bunnies love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Finlayson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice rabbit hutch but needs latch for the roof... Outside of that, it was really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Warnken

customer_reviews.title: Great Hutch
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and very easy to assemble. This is a great hutch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidated at having to put this together at first. However it was very easy. Every hole was pre-drilled. Only needed to hand tighten with a screwdriver to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Cage is very pretty but major flaw in design
customer_reviews.text: Despite reviews and seeing people had issues with urine leaking I ordered this hutch anyway. Well within hours I had urine on my floor and on the legs of the cage. Cage is very pretty but major flaw in design. Asking for refund.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Wish there was something around bottom to prevent things from "spilling" over and out onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went together great no issues.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a first floor then the tray or a sliding door on the in side door to keep the bunny inside while you clean the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfstalker

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks really nice. Some of the pieces don't fit perfectly though.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitline

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful. So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. So many compliments. We use wee wee pads on the bottom shelf so it doesn’t get dameged.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaaaaaay too small for a rabbit. Unless you want it to suffer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Catron

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The wood is definitely soft, so if your bunnies are chewers I'd say go with a different hutch. I wish there was a door so you could keep the bunnies in the opposite side when you're cleaning, but otherwise I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful cage but way too small according to what is need for guinea pigs according to Vets.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor chickens!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s easy to assemble and you can use it for rabbits, guinea pigs, or even chickens. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jota_Je

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to.assenble. can be a little difficult to clean between bars but all in all pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eckel

product_meta.title: Petsfit Rabbit Hutch Grey, Guinea Pigs Cage, Bunny Hutch Wood for Indoor Use
feature_bullets: Solid wood construction, top level and classic design. PAY ATTENTION Tote last photo about how to connect the pneumatic stay bar
Outer dimension: 36"Lx22"Wx30"H. Please check the second photo for more details
Pull out tray, roof can be opened, easy to clean(NO grate included)
Grey and white trim, painted with water-based paint
